integration.name: Integration Tests
integration.description: Tests for component interaction and main class

performance.name: Performance Tests
performance.description: Tests for animation smoothness and memory usage

compatibility.name: Browser Compatibility Tests
compatibility.error:
FAIL tests/browser-compatibility.test.js
  Browser Compatibility Tests
    Modern Browser Support
      ✓ should work in Chrome-like environment (6 ms)
      ✕ should work in Firefox-like environment (23 ms)
      ✕ should work in Safari-like environment (2 ms)
      ✕ should work in Edge-like environment (1 ms)
    Device Pixel Ratio Compatibility
      ✕ should handle standard displays (devicePixelRatio = 1) (1 ms)
      ✕ should handle high-DPI displays (devicePixelRatio = 2)
      ✕ should handle fractional device pixel ratios (1 ms)
      ✕ should handle missing devicePixelRatio
    Animation API Compatibility
      ✕ should work with requestAnimationFrame support (1 ms)
      ✕ should fallback gracefully without requestAnimationFrame
      ✕ should handle performance.now() availability
      ✕ should fallback when performance.now() is unavailable
    Canvas API Compatibility
      ✕ should handle full Canvas 2D API support (2 ms)
      ✕ should handle canvas context creation failure (1 ms)
      ✕ should handle imageSmoothingEnabled property availability (2 ms)
    ResizeObserver Compatibility
      ✕ should use ResizeObserver when available
      ✕ should fallback to window resize events without ResizeObserver
      ✕ should handle ResizeObserver constructor errors
    Module System Compatibility
      ✕ should work as ES6 module (1 ms)
      ✕ should handle different import patterns (1 ms)
    Error Recovery and Graceful Degradation
      ✕ should handle partial API support gracefully (1 ms)
      ✕ should maintain core functionality with limited browser support
      ✕ should handle browser-specific quirks (1 ms)
    Feature Detection
      ✕ should detect and adapt to available browser features (1 ms)
      ✕ should provide browser compatibility information

  ● Browser Compatibility Tests › Modern Browser Support › should work in Firefox-like environment
